name: @cap-js-community/mtx-tool
description: Multitenancy and Extensibility Tool is a cli to reduce operational overhead for multitenant Cloud Foundry applications

scripts.test:record: npm run test:record:reg && npm run test:record:cds && npm run test:record:hdi
scripts.test:record:reg: npx cross-env NOCK_MODE=record jest test/tenantRegistry.test.js --runInBand --updateSnapshot && jest test/tenantRegistry.test.js --runInBand --updateSnapshot
scripts.test:record:cds: npx cross-env NOCK_MODE=record jest test/capMultitenancy.test.js --runInBand --updateSnapshot && jest test/capMultitenancy.test.js --runInBand --updateSnapshot
scripts.test:record:hdi: npx cross-env NOCK_MODE=record jest test/hanaManagement.test.js --runInBand --updateSnapshot && jest test/hanaManagement.test.js --runInBand --updateSnapshot
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier
scripts.lint:ci: npm run eslint:ci && npm run prettier:ci
scripts.docs: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.docs:install: cd docs && npx shx rm -rf vendor Gemfile.lock && bundle install
scripts.upgrade-lock: npx shx rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm i --package-lock

author: Richard Lindner <rlindner81@gmail.com>
